com.mlt.mkt.chart

Class PlotterPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.BorderPane
          • com.mlt.mkt.chart.PlotterPane

  • public class PlotterPane
extends BorderPane
    The pane that effectively plots charts. Has an info pane, a vertical axis and the center chart plotter.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
